info.title: BOMEQP API
info.description: BOMEQP Accreditation Management System API Documentation

get.description: Get categories assigned to ACC or created by ACC.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by category name (English or Arabic)

post.description: Create a new category.

get.description: Get a specific category. Only accessible if assigned to ACC or created by ACC.

404.description: Category not found or not accessible

put.description: Update a category. Only accessible if assigned to ACC or created by ACC.

404.description: Category not found or not accessible

delete.description: Delete a category. Only accessible if created by ACC.

403.description: Cannot delete category - not created by ACC

get.description: Get subcategories for accessible categories.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by sub-category name (English or Arabic)

post.description: Create a new subcategory for an accessible category.

get.description: Get a specific subcategory. Only accessible if the parent category is assigned to ACC or created by ACC.

404.description: Subcategory not found or not accessible

put.description: Update a subcategory. Only accessible if created by ACC or belongs to assigned category.

delete.description: Delete a subcategory. Only accessible if created by ACC.

403.description: Cannot delete subcategory - not created by ACC

get.description: Get all certificates issued for courses belonging to the authenticated ACC.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by trainee name, certificate number, verification code, course name, or training center name

get.description: Get all certificate templates for the authenticated ACC.

post.description: Create a new certificate template for the authenticated ACC.

course_ids.description: Array of course IDs - applies template to these specific courses. At least one course_id must be provided.

put.description: Update a certificate template. Provide course_ids array to update the courses associated with this template.

course_ids.description: Array of course IDs - applies template to these specific courses. At least one course_id must be provided.

403.description: Course does not belong to this ACC

delete.description: Delete a certificate template. Certificates using this template will remain but their template_id will be set to null.

post.summary: Upload background image for certificate template
post.description: Upload a high-resolution background image (JPG/PNG) for the certificate template.

put.description: Update the template designer configuration (config_json) with placeholders, coordinates, and styling.

config_json.description: Array of placeholder configurations with coordinates (as percentages), styling, etc.

get.description: Get all classes from training centers that have authorization from this ACC. Only shows classes for courses that belong to the ACC.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by class name, course name, training center name, instructor name, or status

trainees.description: List of trainees enrolled in this class

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific class. Only shows classes from authorized training centers.

trainees.description: List of trainees enrolled in this class

404.description: Class not found or not authorized

get.description: Get all pending manual payment requests for code purchases from this ACC.

put.description: Approve a manual payment request and complete the code purchase.

message.example: Payment approved and codes generated successfully

400.description: Invalid payment amount or batch already processed

403.description: Not authorized to approve this batch

put.description: Reject a manual payment request.

rejection_reason.example: Payment receipt is unclear or amount mismatch

403.description: Not authorized to reject this batch

get.description: Get all courses for the authenticated ACC with optional filtering.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by course name, code, or description

post.description: Create a new course with optional pricing. If pricing is provided, it will be set for the course.

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific course including pricing.

put.description: Update course details and optionally update or set pricing. If pricing is provided, it will be updated or created.

message.example: Course updated successfully and pricing updated

delete.description: Delete a course. This action cannot be undone.

put.description: Update the active pricing for a course. Pricing is always effective.

post.description: Set base price and commission percentages for a course. Pricing is always effective.

get.description: Get dashboard statistics and data for the authenticated ACC admin.

active_training_centers.description: Total number of training center authorizations (all statuses)

active_instructors.description: Total number of instructor authorizations (all statuses)

certificates_over_time.description: Certificates generated count for last 6 months

get.description: Get all discount codes created by the authenticated ACC.

post.description: Create a new discount code. Supports time-limited or quantity-based discount types.

end_date.description: Required for time_limited type, must be after start_date

get.summary: Get discount codes by ACC ID
get.description: Get all active discount codes for a specific ACC. Can be used by training centers or admins to view available discount codes for an ACC.
Get detailed information about a specific discount code.

put.description: Update discount code information. Only codes created by the ACC can be updated.

delete.description: Delete a discount code. Only codes created by the ACC can be deleted.

post.description: Validate a discount code for a specific course. Checks if code is active, valid dates, and applicable to the course.

get.description: Get all transactions for ACC with comprehensive details including payer, payee, commission ledger, and reference information.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by transaction ID, type, status, description, payer name (ACC/Training Center/Instructor), payee name (ACC/Training Center/Instructor), or payment gateway transaction ID

statistics.description: Detailed statistics by status and transaction type

get.description: Get all monthly settlements for the ACC.
Get all instructor authorization requests for the authenticated ACC with pagination and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by instructor full name (first name, last name, or both), email, training center name, or request ID

get.description: Get all approved authorized instructors for the authenticated ACC with optional filtering, search, and pagination.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by instructor full name (first name, last name, or both), email, phone, or training center name

get.description: Get all materials created by the authenticated ACC with optional filtering.

post.description: Create a new material (PDF, video, presentation, or package) for the marketplace.

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific material.

put.description: Update material information. Only materials created by the ACC can be updated.

delete.description: Delete a material. Only materials created by the ACC can be deleted.

get.description: Get the authenticated ACC's profile information.

post.description: Update the authenticated ACC's profile information including Stripe account ID. Use POST method for file uploads. Laravel's method spoofing with _method=PUT is supported for compatibility.

logo_url.description: Logo URL (optional if logo file is uploaded)

logo.description: Logo file to upload (image file: jpg, jpeg, png, max 5MB)

documents.description: Array of documents to upload or update

id.description: Document ID for update, omit for new document

_method.description: HTTP method override (optional, for compatibility with PUT endpoints)

logo_url.description: Logo URL (optional if logo file is uploaded)

logo.description: Logo file to upload (image file: jpg, jpeg, png, max 5MB)

post.description: Verify if a Stripe Connect account ID is valid and connected to the platform.

stripe_account_id.description: Stripe Connect account ID to verify

post.description: Create a Stripe payment intent for ACC subscription payment.
Create a Stripe payment intent for ACC subscription renewal.

get.description: Get the current subscription for the authenticated ACC.

subscription_price.description: Subscription price set for this ACC

post.description: Process subscription payment after payment intent is confirmed.

400.description: Payment verification failed or invalid request

post.description: Renew ACC subscription. Payment intent must be verified before calling this endpoint.

400.description: Subscription expired or payment verification failed

get.description: Get all training center authorization requests for the authenticated ACC with pagination and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by training center name, email, country, city, or request ID

get.description: Get all approved training centers for the authenticated ACC with pagination and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by training center name, email, country, or city

get.description: Get all pending ACC applications for review with pagination and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by ACC name, legal name, email, registration number, or country

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific ACC application.

put.description: Approve an ACC application (first step). Commission percentage and subscription price are required. ACC will be set to 'approved' status and needs activation before they can start working.

subscription_price.description: Subscription price that the ACC should pay for subscription (required)

put.description: Reject an ACC application with a reason.

post.description: Create a space for an ACC.
Generate credentials for an ACC.

get.description: Get all ACCs with their subscription information, pagination, and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by ACC name, legal name, email, registration number, country, or status

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific ACC.

put.description: Update ACC information.

get.description: Get all categories assigned to an ACC.

put.description: Set the commission percentage for an ACC.

get.description: Get all transactions for a specific ACC.

post.description: Assign a category to an ACC.

delete.description: Remove a category assignment from an ACC.

put.description: Activate an approved ACC (second step). This allows the ACC to start working. ACC must be in 'approved' status.

message.example: ACC activated successfully. ACC can now start working.

400.description: ACC must be approved before activation

get.description: Get all categories with their subcategories, pagination, and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by category name (English or Arabic), description, or status

post.description: Create a new category.

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific category.

put.description: Update category information.

delete.description: Delete a category. This action cannot be undone.

get.description: Get all training classes created by training centers in the system with pagination and search. Admin can only view classes, not create, update, or delete them.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by class name, course name, training center name, instructor name (first, last, or full name), or status

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific training class created by a training center, including enrolled trainees.

get.summary: Get all pending manual payment requests
get.description: Get all pending manual payment requests from all ACCs with pagination and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by batch ID, training center name/email, ACC name/email, course name, or amount

put.description: Approve a manual payment request and complete the code purchase.

message.example: Payment approved and codes generated successfully

400.description: Invalid payment amount or batch already processed

put.description: Reject a manual payment request.

rejection_reason.example: Payment receipt is unclear or amount mismatch

get.description: Get all courses in the system with optional filtering. Includes current pricing information.
Get detailed information about a specific course including ACC, category, pricing, classes, and certificates.
Get dashboard statistics and data for the authenticated group admin user.

training_centers.description: Total number of training centers (all statuses)

entity_distribution.description: Distribution of entities (ACCs, Training Centers, Instructors, Trainees)

get.description: Get financial dashboard statistics for Group Admin.
Get all transactions for Group Admin with comprehensive details including payer, payee, commission ledger, and reference information. Supports pagination and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by transaction ID, type, status, description, payer name (ACC/Training Center), payee name (ACC/Training Center/Instructor), payment gateway transaction ID, amount, or currency

statistics.description: Detailed statistics by status and transaction type

get.description: Get all monthly settlements.

post.description: Request payment for a monthly settlement.

get.description: Get all instructors in the system with optional filtering and pagination.
Get detailed information about a specific instructor including training center, authorizations, course authorizations, classes, and certificates.

put.description: Update instructor information.
Set commission percentage for instructor authorization. Called after ACC Admin approves and sets authorization price.

400.description: Authorization must be approved by ACC Admin first

get.description: Get instructor authorization requests that are approved by ACC Admin and waiting for commission setting by Group Admin, with pagination and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by authorization ID, instructor name (first, last, or full name), ACC name, or training center name

get.summary: Get all ACCs with Stripe Connect status
get.description: Get a list of all ACCs with their Stripe Connect status. Includes search and filter capabilities.

get.summary: Get account details with Stripe Connect status
get.description: Get detailed information about a specific account including Stripe Connect status, requirements, and bank information.

post.summary: Initiate Stripe Connect for an account
post.description: Create a Stripe Connect account and generate onboarding link for the specified account.

get.summary: Get Stripe Connect status for an account
get.description: Get current Stripe Connect status, requirements, and bank information for a specific account.

post.description: Retry initiating Stripe Connect for an account that previously failed.

delete.description: Disconnect and delete Stripe Connect account for the specified account.

post.description: Generate a new onboarding link and send it to the account email.

get.description: Get all Stripe Connect action logs with optional filters.
Get overall statistics about Stripe Connect ACCs including counts and success rate.
Get logs of all actions performed by admin users.
Get all subcategories with optional filtering by category.

post.description: Create a new subcategory.

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific subcategory.

put.description: Update subcategory information.

delete.description: Delete a subcategory. This action cannot be undone.

get.description: Get a list of all training centers with optional filters.
Get detailed information about a specific training center including wallet, instructors, authorizations, certificates, and classes.

put.description: Update training center information.

get.description: Get all pending training center applications for review.

put.description: Approve a training center application.
Reject a training center application with a reason.

get.summary: Get all transfers with pagination and filters
get.description: Get a paginated list of all transfers with optional filters for status, date range, and search.
Get detailed information about a specific transfer.
Get summary statistics for transfers grouped by period (daily, weekly, monthly).

post.description: Manually retry a failed transfer. This will attempt to process the transfer again via Stripe.
Register a new user (Training Center or ACC Admin). Both Training Center and ACC registration require comprehensive company and contact information. Both require group admin approval.

training_provider_type.description: Type of training provider (required for training_center_admin)

facility_floorplan.description: Facility floorplan file (PDF, JPG, PNG, max 10MB, optional, only for training_center_admin)

has_secondary_contact.description: Whether to add secondary contact (optional for training_center_admin, always required for acc_admin)

acc_email.description: Accreditation body email address (required for acc_admin)

primary_contact_passport.description: Primary contact passport copy (PDF, JPG, PNG, max 10MB, required for acc_admin)

secondary_contact_passport.description: Secondary contact passport copy (PDF, JPG, PNG, max 10MB, required for acc_admin)

mailing_same_as_physical.description: Whether mailing address is same as physical address (for both roles)

mailing_address.description: Mailing address (required if mailing_same_as_physical is false)

mailing_city.description: Mailing city (required if mailing_same_as_physical is false)

mailing_country.description: Mailing country (required if mailing_same_as_physical is false)

mailing_postal_code.description: Mailing postal code (required if mailing_same_as_physical is false)

primary_contact_title.description: Primary contact title (required for both roles)

primary_contact_first_name.description: Primary contact first name (required for both roles)

primary_contact_last_name.description: Primary contact last name (required for both roles)

primary_contact_email.description: Primary contact email (required for both roles)

primary_contact_country.description: Primary contact country (required for both roles)

primary_contact_mobile.description: Primary contact mobile number (required for both roles)

secondary_contact_title.description: Secondary contact title (required if has_secondary_contact is true for training_center_admin, always required for acc_admin)

secondary_contact_first_name.description: Secondary contact first name (required if has_secondary_contact is true for training_center_admin, always required for acc_admin)

secondary_contact_last_name.description: Secondary contact last name (required if has_secondary_contact is true for training_center_admin, always required for acc_admin)

secondary_contact_email.description: Secondary contact email (required if has_secondary_contact is true for training_center_admin, always required for acc_admin)

secondary_contact_country.description: Secondary contact country (required if has_secondary_contact is true for training_center_admin, always required for acc_admin)

secondary_contact_mobile.description: Secondary contact mobile number (required if has_secondary_contact is true for training_center_admin, always required for acc_admin)

company_gov_registry_number.description: Company government registry number (required for both roles)

company_registration_certificate.description: Company registration certificate file (PDF, JPG, PNG, max 10MB, required for both roles)

how_did_you_hear_about_us.description: How did you hear about us (optional for both roles)

agreed_to_receive_communications.description: Agreement to receive communications (required for both roles, must be true)

agreed_to_terms_and_conditions.description: Agreement to terms and conditions (required for both roles, must be true)

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password. Returns authentication token.
Logout the authenticated user and invalidate the current token.

get.description: Get the authenticated user's profile information. The name field is synced with the Training Center or ACC profile based on the user's role.

put.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information.
Change the authenticated user's password.

422.description: Validation error or incorrect current password

post.description: Request a password reset link to be sent to the user's email.

message.example: Password reset link sent to your email

post.description: Reset user password using the token from the password reset email.

get.description: Verify user email address using the verification token.
Verify a certificate using its verification code. This is a public endpoint.
Get a list of cities, optionally filtered by country code.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Filter cities by country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)

get.description: Get a list of all countries with their ISO codes and names.
Serve an instructor CV file. This is a public endpoint.
Serve an instructor certificate file. This is a public endpoint.
Serve an instructor profile image file. This is a public endpoint.
Serve an instructor passport copy file. This is a public endpoint.
Serve a file from public storage. Only authorized paths are allowed.
Get all classes assigned to the authenticated instructor.
Get detailed information about a specific class assigned to the instructor.

post.description: Mark a class as completed with completion rate and notes. Class end date must have passed.

400.description: Class end date has not been reached

get.description: Returns all data needed for the instructor dashboard including profile, class statistics, recent classes, earnings, training centers, ACCs, and notifications.

is_assessor.description: Whether the instructor is an assessor

get.description: Get earnings and transactions for the authenticated instructor with optional filtering by month/year.
Get the authenticated instructor's profile information including personal details and training center.

post.description: Update the authenticated instructor's profile information. Use POST method for file uploads. Laravel's method spoofing with _method=PUT is supported for compatibility.

schema.description: Note: email and id_number cannot be changed by instructor for security reasons. is_assessor can only be changed by training center.

_method.description: HTTP method override (optional, for compatibility with PUT endpoints)

photo.description: Profile image file (jpg, jpeg, png, max 5MB)

certificates.description: Array of certificate objects. Each certificate can have a certificate_file (PDF) uploaded, or you can provide certificates as JSON with name, issue_date, and optionally url.

certificate_file.description: Certificate PDF file (max 10MB) - upload file instead of providing URL

certificate_files.description: Alternative: Array of certificate PDF files. Files will be matched with certificates array by index.

get.description: Get a list of all active nationalities ordered by sort order and name. This endpoint is public and can be used anywhere nationality selection is needed.
Get all notifications for the authenticated user with optional filtering and pagination.
Get the count of unread notifications for the authenticated user.
Get a specific notification by ID.

put.description: Mark a specific notification as read.
Mark a specific notification as unread.

post.description: Mark all notifications for the authenticated user as read.

delete.description: Delete all read notifications for the authenticated user.

get.description: Get Stripe publishable key and configuration status.

post.description: Create a Stripe payment intent for a transaction.
Confirm a Stripe payment intent. Can be called manually or via webhook.
Handle Stripe webhook events for payment status updates. This endpoint is called by Stripe.
Process a refund for a Stripe payment. Can refund full or partial amount.

amount.description: Partial refund amount. If not provided, full refund will be processed.

get.description: Get all active ACCs available for authorization requests with pagination and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by ACC name, legal name, email, or country

post.description: Request authorization from an ACC. Upload required documents.

file.description: Document file (PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG, max 10MB)

404.description: Training center or ACC not found

get.description: Get all authorization requests for the authenticated training center.

post.description: Create a new authorization request for an ACC. This endpoint accepts ACC ID in the request body along with documents.

acc_id.description: ACC ID to request authorization from

file.description: Document file (PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG, max 10MB)

404.description: Training center or ACC not found

get.description: Get all certificates generated by the training center with optional filtering.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by trainee name, certificate number, or course name

post.description: Generate and issue a new certificate. Select ACC and Course, then enter student name. The system will automatically select the appropriate template and generate the certificate.

course_id.description: ID of the course from the selected ACC

403.description: ACC not authorized or course not available

404.description: ACC, Course, or Template not found

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific certificate.
Check if a certificate is valid. Returns certificate status and validity information.

403.description: Certificate does not belong to this training center

get.description: Download the certificate PDF/image file.

403.description: Certificate does not belong to this training center

get.summary: Get authorized ACCs for certificate generation
get.description: Get all authorized ACCs that the training center can generate certificates for.
Get all training classes for the authenticated training center with pagination and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by class name, course name, instructor name, or status

post.description: Create a new training class. The course must belong to an ACC that has authorized the training center.

trainee_ids.description: Array of trainee IDs to enroll in this training class

403.description: Course not available - ACC authorization required, Instructor not authorized to teach this course, or Training center has not paid instructor authorization payment to ACC

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific training class.

put.description: Update training class information.

trainee_ids.description: Array of trainee IDs to sync with this training class (replaces existing enrollments)

403.description: Instructor not authorized to teach this course from the ACC, or Training center has not paid instructor authorization payment to ACC

delete.description: Delete a training class. This action cannot be undone.

post.description: Mark a training class as completed and create a completion record.

post.summary: Create payment intent for code purchase
post.description: Create a Stripe payment intent for purchasing certificate codes. Calculates pricing including discounts. Also returns information about available payment methods including manual payment option.

400.description: Invalid request or pricing not found

404.description: Training center, ACC, or course not found

post.description: Purchase certificate codes after payment intent is confirmed. Generates codes and creates batch. Use multipart/form-data when uploading payment_receipt for manual payment. DO NOT manually set Content-Type header when using FormData - let the browser set it automatically.

payment_receipt.description: Required if payment_method is manual_payment. File must be PDF, JPG, JPEG, or PNG, max 10MB. IMPORTANT: When using FormData, do NOT manually set Content-Type header - let browser set it automatically.

payment_method.description: Note: manual_payment requires multipart/form-data for file upload

400.description: Payment verification failed or invalid request

403.description: ACC not active or authorization required

404.description: Training center, ACC, course, or pricing not found

get.description: Get all certificate codes owned by the training center with optional filtering.
Get all code purchase batches for the training center.
Get all courses from ACCs that have approved this training center. Only shows active courses.
Get detailed information about a specific course from an authorized ACC.

403.description: Course not available - ACC authorization required

get.description: Get dashboard statistics and data for the authenticated training center admin.

authorized_accreditations.description: Total number of ACC authorizations (all statuses)

get.description: Get all instructors for the authenticated training center with pagination and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by instructor name, email, phone, or ID number

post.description: Create a new instructor. An email with login credentials will be sent to the instructor.

is_assessor.description: true for Assessor, false for Instructor

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific instructor.

post.description: Update instructor information. Use POST method for file uploads. Laravel's method spoofing with _method=PUT is supported for compatibility.

_method.description: HTTP method override (optional, for compatibility with PUT endpoints)

is_assessor.description: true for Assessor, false for Instructor

get.summary: Get courses by ACC and sub-category
get.description: Get all active courses for a specific ACC, optionally filtered by sub-category.
Get all categories assigned to a specific ACC.
Get all sub-categories that belong to a specific category.

post.description: Request authorization for an instructor to teach courses from an ACC. You can either select a sub-category (all courses in that sub-category) or select specific courses.

acc_id.description: ACC ID to request authorization from

sub_category_id.description: Sub-category ID - authorizes instructor for all courses in this sub-category

course_ids.description: Array of specific course IDs to authorize

courses_count.description: Number of courses included in the authorization

422.description: Validation error - either sub_category_id or course_ids must be provided, but not both

get.description: Get all instructor authorization requests for the authenticated training center with pagination and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by instructor full name (first name, last name, or both), ACC name, or authorization ID

get.description: Get all active materials available in the marketplace with optional filtering.
Get detailed information about a specific marketplace material.

post.description: Purchase a material, course, or package from the marketplace.

400.description: Purchase type not implemented or invalid request

404.description: Training center or item not found

get.description: Get all items purchased by the training center from the marketplace.
Get the authenticated training center admin's profile information including all training center data.

post.description: Update the authenticated training center's profile information. Use POST method for file uploads. Laravel's method spoofing with _method=PUT is supported for compatibility. All fields are optional.

logo_url.description: Logo URL (optional if logo file is uploaded)

_method.description: HTTP method override (optional, for compatibility with PUT endpoints)

logo_url.description: Logo URL (optional if logo file is uploaded)

logo.description: Logo file to upload (image file: jpg, jpeg, png, max 5MB)

get.description: Get all trainees for the authenticated training center with optional filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by trainee name, email, phone, or ID number

post.description: Create a new trainee with ID and card images. Can optionally enroll in classes.

id_image.description: Passport/National ID copy (JPEG, PNG, PDF, max 10MB)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific trainee.

post.description: Update trainee information. Use POST method for file uploads. Can update personal details, images, and enrolled classes. Laravel method spoofing with _method=PUT is supported for compatibility.

_method.description: HTTP method override (optional, for compatibility with PUT endpoints)

id_image.description: Passport/National ID copy (JPEG, PNG, PDF, max 10MB)

delete.description: Delete a trainee and associated files. This action cannot be undone.

get.description: Get all transactions for Training Center with comprehensive details including payer, payee, commission ledger, and reference information.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by transaction ID, type, status, description, payer name (ACC/Training Center/Instructor), payee name (ACC/Training Center/Instructor), or payment gateway transaction ID

statistics.description: Detailed statistics by status and transaction type
